about_the_game: Change the way your heroes look with this pack of 3 alternative outfits for Galeb, Emem and Leysha.

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes intense violence, blood and gore, including decapitation, dismemberment and torture. It also contains content of a sexual nature, partial nudity, coarse language and references to drug use.

detailed_description: Change the way your heroes look with this pack of 3 alternative outfits for Galeb, Emem and Leysha.

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti, 4 GB or AMD Radeon HD 7790, 4 GB
